[h1] Здравствуй, друг мой [/h1]
Сегодня я расскажу тебе немного о PewDiePie: Legend of the Brofist.

[h1] Сюжет [/h1]
Популярный на весь мир ютубер Pewdiepie, так же известный как шведский видеоблогер и деятель шоу-бизнеса, Феликс Чельберг как всегда снимал видео на Youtube, после чего в дом врывается бочка, которая сообщает о том, что они захватили его фанатов и им остается поймать только самого Pewdiepie'я.
[h1] Геймплей [/h1]
1) Помните водопроводчика Марио? Ну так вот. Система сражения точно такая же

Способности (или же бонусы)
Компаньоны

Легкий
Сложный
"БРО"
Включая 1 режим открывающийся после прохождения игры
"МОПС" в котором есть 1 правило: одна тычка - смерть
[h1] ИТОГ [/h1]
Эта игра заслуживает 9.5/10, ибо есть некоторые проблемы с хитбоксами.
Рекомендую

29400699.review:
(I've been meaning to review this game, I just forgot.) 

Now this is a game for any kind of Bro. Sure, over the past years Pewds may have stopped playing video games, but he still carries on his legacy. 

The pixel graphics are my favourite, the soundtrack is nice and upbeat, and even if some of the voice acting is bad-but good considering they were new to it at the time-, I can see past that and just enjoy the all around randomness of the game. It's amazing, one second you're in this huge house fighting off talking barrels, learning about the power and the legend of the Brofist, then you're in the air with Markiplier shooting off ducks, barrles and even a few unicorns here and there. Legend of the Brofist is just one of those games with humerous moments and an odd plot. 

Might not play it as much as I used to, but I love this game and always will.

29152556.review:
Прошел почти год с того момента, как я купила себе PewDiePie: Legend of Brofist. Случилось это абсолютно случайно, на 14-ое февраля мне стало скучно и тоскливо и я решила потешить себя хоть чем-то приятненьким в этот день одиночества.

И не промахнулась.

Являясь давней «поклонницей» (время от времени в моей предложке все же всплывают новые видео от данного видеоблогера и пропустить их мимо себя я не могу, да и не хочу), каждая игровая шутка, фентифлюшка, враг, союзник были мне знакомы и это было безумно приятно. Диалоги неплохи, наполнены юмором, который будет понятен не только фанату, но и обычному обывателю. Сюжет, конечно, мог бы быть и позакрученнее, но в игре про Феликса просто невозможно воспринимать серьёзные диалоги. Да и обращая взгляд на большинство платформеров, которые нынче производятся, серьёзный сюжет ненужон.
Уровни и геймплей. Здесь все довольно-таки просто: беги, прыгай сверху, собирай монетки, иногда атакуй и защищайся. Однако, иногда очень сильно подбешивает, что приходится перепроходить какие-то идиотские моменты по нескольку раз – умереть очень легко. От этого игра вызывает простое негодование и смачное избиение своего лица со словами «НУ КАК ТАК, Я ЖЕ СДЕЛАЛ ВСЕ ПРАВИЛЬНО». 
В целом, игра неплоха. Спустя год я решила перепройти всю игру с поиском всех заплаток (местный коллектблс) и на Тяжёлом уровне (никаких отличий от лёгкого уровня нет, просто сердечек отнимается два при ранении, а не одно). Во время сессии потрясающе отвлекает от загруза, помогает в каких-то случаях расслабиться и забыть о проблемах. 

В общем, 8 Шенон из 10 Стефано. Рекомендую.

25578706.review:
I bought this game because I'm a big fan of PewDiePie, but...
The gameplay is weird, especially jumping mechanics. There are times when you jump around enemy like crazy, and can't hit them. Characters tend to slide off platforms, they might also jump and reach the platform, but somehow not land on it (and fall to their death in most cases). This happened especially on holiday maps (Halloween, Valentine's Day and so on)
Also, the gameplay is repetitive, you go from place to place, kill the boss after few arenas, and so on.
Level designs are ok, but could be better.
Artstyle and music are really nice. Voice acting is decent, I believe Markiplier did the best job.
Extra note: I didn't play in Polish (I switched to English) but I can see why people are complaining about translation, looking only at achievements section. It's both bad and cringy.
In the end, I give this game solid 4/10. It's not the worst, but could be (and should be) a lot better.

Чесно кажучи, я за все життя переглянув 1 чи 2 відео від PewDiePie і навіть не пам’ятаю про що саме. Хоча я іноді дивлюся відео по іграх перед їхнім придбанням. Думав спочатку, що гра зроблена спеціально для реклами того самого ютубера, але виявилося навпаки. Саме цей PewDiePie та ще декілька імен якихось відомих ютуберів відкривають цю гру для загалу.

Сама гра є виконаною у класичному стилі у вигляді 2D платформера. Так само в ній зроблене гарне озвучення. Відповідний їй ігровий процес: стрибаємо, стрибаємо, стрибаємо. Все досить непогано, цікаво. 30 рівнів, бонуси, супер сили, боси і т.д. Декілька героїв для гри. Тобто гра добра, весела. Проте я б не сказав, що в ній настільки багато гумору, ніж очікувалося. Також вона досить короткотривала на легкому рівні складності.

Тут справа в іншому. У pewdiepie 47 з гаком млн підписників, у markiplier - більше 14 млн і т.д. Рахувати лінь, просто зрозуміло - до біса багато. Але гра не тягне на всю цю аудиторію. Лише на її частину. Надто вже гумор дитячий, хоча я переглянув деякі відео з переліку героїв гри і побачив, що у них контент на куди ширшу аудиторію, та й висловлювання далеко не завжди для дітей, а для загальної розваги.

Гра підтримує 18 бозна-яких мов, але української немає у переліку.

Висновок: приємна забавка, легка в ній атмосфера, особливо сподобається прихильникам тих ютуберів, але доволі дитяча за вмістом.

24761034.review:
Surprisingly, this was a great play ( well still is). I have completed the game twice, on easy and medium. Each difficulty makes the game more challenging (to no-one's surprise) and with each level of difficulty, makes the game more fun. Maybe you want a relaxing 2D platformer with the easy difficulty or whether you want to play the Dark Souls of 2D platformers with 1 life pug mode. 
This games story is ok. It is nice to see the well known Youtubers all come together in one game and fight along-side each other. The references are fun. However, it suffers from something that I call "Mario Story Disease". Main Villian steals something, Main character goes to get it back, goes through endless hords of enemies by jumping on them or killing them in any way, fights a variety of mini-bosses to get to main one, kills main boss, the end. That sums up the story. Its witty, but lacks a unique factor other that "duuh, my fav utober is there, duuh". That isn't unique
Conclusion
I would give this a game  a:
8.5 / 10
- It is really fun
- Controlls well
- Got lots of recognisable faces
- Likeable characters and lots of development
- With some really good character development.
However:
- The story is predictable
- Lacks the character development which I was expecting
- Co-op is local ( I think)
- Repetative after a while.

I have been BabyFace, and that is what I thought of Pewdiepie: Legend of the Brofist.

24338907.review:
... You know, when I first bought this game, I went in with expectations of hating because it was pandering to fans of a big-name YouTuber looking to make a quick buck. Ten minutes in, I was surprised to find myself actually enjoying it.

The game itself is relatively simple, in both gameplay and plot. Pewdiepie's fans have been kidnapped by Barrels, and now he has to team up with his friends (Marzia, Markiplier, CinnamonToastKen, and so forth) to get them back. The game is mostly a platformer, jump on enemies to beat them, grab coins for upgrades, get special weapons and all that jazz. Sometimes, there are levels where you have to survive a horde of enemies until escape arrives, and a few shoot 'em up levels in the sky, so there's at least variety. The voice acting is pretty standard (I mean, it's not awful, but given the personalities behind said voices, it could be better), and the game itself is full of in-jokes fans of these YouTubers will greatly enjoy.

I'm not praising this game as a god among titans, especially as an indie title, but it's a fun little game I used to pass the time. It has its moments, and can be genuinely entertaining at times. My final verdict is a 7/10, a game I would recommend to fans of these Let's Players and as a fun platformer for kicks.

23797827.review:
Первое, на что я псмотрел перейдя на страницу в магазине - это скриншоты.
Мне уже началась нравиться это игра и оказалось там добавили еще много всего разнообразного.

Об озвучке. Читая описание я думал, что они наврали с оригинальной озвучкой. Оказалось нет.

Руссификация. Мы покупаем игры не просто для того что-бы посмотреть картинку, но и влиться в сюжет. Нет ничего странного, что нет русской озвучки. Но хороший перевод через субтитры сделали.

На счет совместной локальной игры наврали. Её тут нет. Оказывается нужно просто 1 джойстик (Да! Не геймпад. Я вырос на денди) и 1 клавиатуру. Или по крайней мере 2 клавиатуры для совместого прохождения.

Маленький, но приятный плюс - это поддержка Steam Cloud. теперь можно не беспокоиться, что все данные игры стерутся и просто сохранить в облаке.

Не знаю я насчет режима "Бро". Лично даже 1 уровень не мог пройти с ним. Оставалось несколько шагов до машины. Надеюсь понизят некоторые значения.

Минус этой игры в том, что она очень быстро проходиться. Достаточно 3 часа. Остальная половина - это дополнительные уровни.

22191746.review:
PewDiePie: Legend of the Brofist is a game that seems to be most bought by people who hate Pewds and then give hilarious and original reviews like "this game gave me cancer." The other unintended audience seems to be people who aren't fond of the "memes" in this game, despite probably being people who can't resist sending Lenny faces after each sentence and probably being quite the dank memester themselves.
I mean, nothing says "I hate PewDiePie" more than buying his game, right?

On a more serious note, this is a fun and quirky platformer in the spirit of TurboGrafx-16 games; at least, personally I could feel a faint Bonk vibe in this. It's rather short, yeah, but fun and replayable, and the local multiplayer is a nice bonus. The game has a silly story and numerous references to Pewds' videos (which are memes, according to obviously qualified reviewers), accompanied by occasional voice acting just as serious as the plot. 

It's simple and fun, I don't know. I probably didn't expect AAA quality and wasn't disappointed?

22090489.review:
the game is anything but ground breaking but its still a good game. where the game falls is its difficulty depending on what stage you pick you're going to go through the game increasing the health and getting new powers ignoring anything youtuber realated you're in for a pretty generic platformer with a huge amount of difficulty. you have four difficulties to choose from but the final one is unavaliable until you beat ever stage on "Bro" dificulty which is pretty hard. look some of these reviews are talking about the game as if its an illness because its pewdiepie. you have a pretty good selection of youtubers to take on this game but you have to buy and unlock them first. not in that order. the only two available at the start are martzia and pewds. not long in you'll get mark soon after you'll find jack and ken. only towards the final level do you unlock the final youtuber. cryotic. every character has a partner or two for help on the way edgar maya TTT Sam Ken's dogs and Cry's mini crys. only after getting every badge in the game do you unlock the ability to get the duck character. not to sure whats up with it i've yet to buy it in game. 
the story is forgetable but it gets so ridiculous at times that you cant. its not very important to keep you going in the game. but then again, did the first mario need the story to be fun? do any mario games other than the rpgs need story? no and this one doesnt either the story's alright though completelly ridiculous. *spoilers* pewds has to rescue his fans and friends that have been captured by the EVIL barrels and the dreaded barrel king in order to get the legendary brofist this games mcguffin. going through and rescuing everyone will eventually bring you to the dreaded barrel king the journey as well as the final fight is hard enough in places to make it challenging. it took me a good few tries to get to it. killing things like t-rex's and illuminatis will get you achievements cause you have to either be extremelly good at jumping or have a good skill to use skills are unlocked as you go the final one being the brofist which is only used by pewds
going through and completing this game will nab you steam achievements and yes i will recomend this game to someone that wants a nice throwback to hard games like megaman. while no jumpnshoot mechanic making more like mario it still has the style of a megaman game and the difficulty. the game does have problems im not going to say its perfect cause its not. the voice acting...isnt the best but then again these are the youtubers doing it and you can skip it! the difficulty can be a little bullshit at times and how hard enemies hit you varies sometimes. but its a good game and i recomend you at least play it more than an hour or two before you judge it dont look at it like its pewdiepie. cause you can skip pretty much everything that has to do with him. the game has a few cutscenes whcih can be skipped.

so by all means play it dont complete it cause you will have a slog of things to do. it got kind of annoying gathering certain patches

21628103.review:
Буквально спустя пару уровней я понял, что игра уже окупилась. Серьезно, эта игра действительно не была создана для зарабатывания денег, она сделана с душой, это очень заметно.

Плюсы
+Куча отсылок к Пьюдипаю и его творчеству. Фанаты оценят.
+Незамысловатый юмор.
+Пьюдипай, Марция, Маркплаер и другие известные ТыТруберы.
+И они озвучили сами себя.
+Приятная ретро-стилизация с пиксельным графеном и 16-битным саундтреком.
+Казуалы могут расслабиться на сложности Утя, хардкорщики сломают не один геймпад на сложностях Брофист или Мопс
+Проходится на одном дыхании.
И другие.

Минусы.
-Проходится действительно на одном дыхании. Я наиграл пару часов но УЖЕ прошел все уровни на утю.
-Реиграбельность только для манчикинов. Собери все нашивки, прокачай всех персонажей, купи все улучшения, пройди все уровни на более сложном, и так, пока не будет 100%.
-Некоторые хохмочки мне были непонятны, так как я не смотрел абсолютно ВСЕ видео Пьюдса. Кто такой Стефано? Что за взрывающаяся корова? Почему акула разговаривает и ее зовут Шонан? Нужно быть реально преданным фаном, чтобы прочувствовать весь сок.

Не смотря на недостатки, я считаю, что игра потрясающая. Советую купить ее. Фанатам Пудса Мастхев. Если даже не слышали о нем, то игрушка просто может не цепануть, обернувшись очередным платформером с непонятным сюжетом.

21595842.review:
Co dodat, pokud jste fanoušky zahraničního youtubu určitě vás hra potěší. A to díky narážkám a různým vtípkům od postav. Na hře mám něco okolo 15ti hodin a pořád mě to baví, snažím se mít všechny achievementy. Hra není nějak moc dlouhá a pokud nejste noob, tak by jste ji na easy měli dohrát do 3 hodin. Já ji dohrál za jeden večer na hard. Jsou zde momenty, které vás pořádně naštvou, ale naopak i ty, které vás rozveselí. Abych to nějak shrnul. Jedná se o 2D "plošinovku", která má určitý příběh o tom, jak zlý barel ukradl fanoušky Pewdiepiovi a on, společně s jeho přáteli, je musí získat zpět. Hra není nějak dlouhá, ale pokud chcete pořádnou výzvu dohrejte všechny levely na Pug Mode (máte jedno srdíčko). Dále zde máte 3 bosse + hlavního a k tomu 3 bonusové levely (Valentýnský, Vánoční, Halloweenský). Máte zde spoustu věcí co můžete nakupovat a to: Útoky pro hrdiny, kdy každý hrdina má svůj speciální, Obrané "spelly", ty jsou většinou u všech stejné, srdíčka a samotné postavy. Ve hře jsou dále schované odznaky, u kterých mě celkem naštvalo to, že některé nešly vzít přes jednu postavu a musel jsem si na ten level vzít jinou postavu, abych ho získal (mám všechny, není je těžké najít, jen na jeden jsem potřeboval pomoc, protože jsem nevěděl, jak se k němu dostat). To by bylo asi vše. :)

+Zábava
+Vtípky
+Za mě pěkně udělaná grafika
+Rozmanitost postav, útoků a obraných spellů
+Bonusové levely
+Spoustu odznaků ke sbírání
+Výzva
+Zajímavý příběh
+Dobré bossfighty
+Pěkné prostředí
--------------------------------------------
-Herní doba příběhu
-K některým odznakům nutno jinou postavu
-Po čase stereotyp
-Prasklé nervy
-Chybí mi Agraelus (:D)
-Ovladání není uděláno pro klávesnici, takže musíte přijít jak se co ovládá (skok mezerník/W/šipka na horu, utočný item 1/+ a defensivní 2/ě)

Sečteno, podtrženo za 7,99€ se jedná o poměrně kvalitní hru, která vám dá docela zabrat. Já ji osobně doporučuji, ale tak já jsem fanda Pewdiepie a mám rád rage hry (Super Meat Boy, Cat Mario atd.). Pokud očekáváte grafiku jako Battlefield nebo hru, která předčí nové Far Cry ruce pryč, byli by jste zkalamaní. Na mobilu jsem to nezkoušel, ale myslím si, že na PC se to lépe ovládá. :)

420/69 a.k.a 9/10 - za mě :)

21382528.review:
[quote=]I've received a review key, however, this has not affected my review.[/quote]

[h1] "Woah, PewDiePie is even on Steam.. ?" [/h1]

Yes, yes it is! A tribute to all the fans of PewDiePie and quite an excellent tribute, meant to satisfy the hunger of the fans. The game is solely for the fans, if you're not a fan of PewDiePie you'll not enjoy the content too much, honestly. I don't like the fact that there are so many haters at the reviews, they shouldn't be so harsh on this just because there's PewDiePie in it and it's not a solid release like they wanted or something. It's something for the fans, after all and should be treated as a fan tribute, not like garbage. It's not anyone's problem that you can't enjoy a game just because you have a certain hatred for one of the YouTubers included into this game. This little rant was just to highlight the bad part of the community. Anyway . . .

[h1] First Sight [/h1]

Some pixel game with PewDiePie and others, what could go wrong? 

[h1] Gameplay [/h1]

Once you launch the game and get into the first level, you're greeted by the star, PewDiePie himself. Furthermore, get assaulted by barrels and then you question yourself. [b] "Is this a prank of some sort?" [/b] Not really, but its where the fun and slaughter itself begins. Wood planks fly everywhere as you try to rescue the stars in Pewds' fandom, the difficulty increasing as more versions of the barrels start to spawn. 

Basically, the whole house's walls are torn apart and you can see holes everywhere like World War III has unleashed upon PewDiePie's house. Once finished, get called by the barrel king and told to join the barrels or get rekt or something. Been confused about it. Furthermore, get chased down by the first boss and battle barrels while jumping from car to car too. Here comes the part where it hits the fan, the difficulty is even more complex and tougher for platformer newbies and pros alike, in my opinion. 

[b] I had absolutely no problems with the mechanics or any freezing whatsoever. [/b]

But, difficulty is just to make the game more fun and challenging to think of a really big reward as well, right, riiiight.. ?
Answer is, yes.

Upon finishing most levels on the Bro difficulty and the nice amount of achievements really makes it feel satisfying on the rewarding part, which makes it absolutely sweet.

[h1] Graphics [/h1]

The pixel environment is really vivid and the absolute eye candy, really, its worth playing the game for the pixel work as well in my opinion. Enjoyed it and gives off a nice charm.

[h1] OST & SFX [/h1]

The chiptune tracks really blasted off into my ears with an amazing feeling, not only that but fits into every level. RUSHJET1 did a great job with the soundtrack, and the sound effects are well done as well. The voice acting isn't something to praise, but it does its job, the little bit atleast.

[h1] Pros'n'Cons [/h1]

[b]Pros[/b]

+Lots of achievements
+Addicting
+Challenging
+Colorful, beautiful surroundings

[b]Cons[/b]

-On my side, there's absolutely no cons. I'm no PewDiePie fanboy, but aside from the weak voice acting there is no con.

[h1] Should you buy it? [/h1]

I recommend to buy it when it's on sale and/or if you want to kill your time and add more achievements to your collection.

21075261.review:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Bm3WYzaqsQ

Many have heard about Pewdiepie and either adore him or dislike him fueled by personal reasoning, whatever the excuse, Pewdiepie is a renowned “Let’s Play” YouTuber with the largest subscriber count to date and now a game to add to the fame. The game lets the player take the role of Pewdiepie, along with other Let’s Players associated with him, to venture through tedious, platforming landscapes to rescue Pewds fans from the grasps of the relentless and evil Barrels. The game plays like a standard platformer adding other intriguing retro style elements similar to Gradius on the NES to make a bit of variety, which keeps the game interesting.

 What I liked:

Quirky Opponents - While playing the game one sudden realization surfaced: this game is in no way meant to be taken seriously, not even the slightest. After all, the title pays homeage to Pewdiepie’s quirky, online behaviour. The levels are littered with an assortment of random enemies, each one harboring their own unique way of harming you. Most enemies are a variation of barrel characters ranging from regular barrels, who just hop ever-so-closely in hopes of inflicting damage, to TNT barrels that simply explode when you come into close proximity to spray you with harmful debris. While you may think about the oddity of such opponents, things get more peculiar as you witness killer whales falling from the sky and mystical unicorns charging at you with their rainbow entrails. Like I said, the enemies get interesting and/or ridiculous, which is amusing a lot of the time.

Skills or Just Difficult- Platforming is a skill that wasn’t ever weaved into my DNA so it all depends on the player and their level of expertise that will determine the punishment of this game. For someone like myself (who lacks basic platforming skills) they might find the easy mode option appropriate for beating the game, while those who do require a challenge to fully prove themselves can do so. The players can choose between easy, medium and hard which are represented by icons referenced from Pewdiepie’s videos. Depending on each difficulty, opponents can inflict more damage and spawn numerously while levels add environmental dangers to keep you on your toes. Although there was trouble with this, it was appreciated that each level of difficulty was  appropriately tedious. 


It’s the Personality and Attacks- When you start the game, players are given the option to select between Pewds and Marzia as their controllable protagonist. As you progress further into the game other YouTubers become available for purchase for a set fee. Upon unlocking them, you can then upgrade their health with in-game currency as well as acquire desirable attacks and defences, however, each character has a designated attack that is tailored to their individualistic attributes. It makes it intriguing but doesn’t necessarily give the player the advantage as each character is limited to one attack and defence move at a time.

What I disliked:

Storytelling-  As stated earlier, this game honestly does not merit a serious reaction. The voice acting is respectively performed by the actual YouTubers themselves and unfortunately sounds more awkward than they probably initially planned. Each sentence was often read with such a dull, monotone rhythm and lacked any excitement, making the storytelling lackluster and forgettable. Then again, the story is overly simplistic since all you’re doing is rescuing the viewers from evil Barrels.

Controls-  For most platformers, gameplay mechanics aren’t usually in-depth and complicated. Playing each level should be smooth and with quick ease, however, the controls for this game, even though simple, feel deliberate and awkward at times.  In-game, you have the typical jump with an added bonus of an attack and defence ability. Although the title has these added attributes, controlling the character feels sluggish at times. It also doesn’t help that there is only one default speed implemented in the game. It would have been better to have a sprint like in Mario games.

Over Referenced- The game has a substantial amount of references that will be lost on those who aren't familiar with Pewdiepie’s content. A lot of the images and story plot is ridiculously random just to fit in with the references.

Conclusion: Pewdiepie: The Legend of the Brofist is definitely a game for fans because they’ll appreciate the many odd jokes referred in the game. The game had an interesting concept of adding attack and defence abilities but overall gameplay felt slow and sluggish. 

Score: Wait for a sale

21066714.review:
Well this is a game I really didn't expect to be any good considering who it's based on and considering there there are no realy quality fangames for this particular LPer.
But I was pleasently surprised.

The game itself is pretty short, just under three hours if you play every level on easy mode.  However for those three hours you get a lot of content.  Multiple characters (of which I mainly used one when I unlocked him),  Different attack and defense abilities which I only used a couple because all the rest just didn't seem that useful.  And of course extra stages that unlock costumes.

The graphics are nice and mesh well together with the exception of the potrait shots during dialog sections,  they kinda look like crap.  The voice acting in most parts needs a bit of work and feels stilted but for some characters gets better as the game progresses, with the exception of Marzia's who I found annoying, but then again I didn't use her at all because outside of being the player two character for local-coop just didn't bring anything to the table except be annoying whenever she came up.

This game clearly had a lot of care put into it and there is a whole bunch small details such as the way certain items interact with the environment, character costumes are reflected in the cutscenes and loading screens with one costume for pewdiepie tying a certain scene together making it all the more hilarious as it goes on.

But I will admit I actually didn't play as the pewsdter as soon I was able to unlock and play as the lper I like more,  I totally skipped Marzia without even bothering to buy her.  The others I touched upon on my stream of the game just to show them off.
All said this was a neat little game and you get a whole lot for a mere six dollars.  and believe me I've played far worse games that had this price tag.  I'm looking at you Banzai Pecan. 
Anyhoo I hope this helps with your decision on whether you want to get the game or not.

20663705.review:
It's not the next Braid, but mechanically it's a decent game. There's not much to fault it for other than being short and the over-the-top fan pandering which, as indifferent, I found to generally be off-putting or not make sense (a rock named Jennifer?), but at the same time I commend it for aiming to please and be memorable to its fans rather than something generic. Needless to say if you despise the guy then you'll despise this game.

Pros:
-It has a nice high-res pixel art aesthetic, looking something like an HD GBA game.
-The music is pretty great. It sounds like it's going for an NES style and comes off as authentic to me.
-Fully voiced, though you may consider that a con as they're not voice actors by trade.
-Collectibles and unlockables to give you stuff to do while/after beating the game. The collectibles are put into tricky-to-reach or hidden areas throughout the levels.
-There are a number of small touches that make it feel like a polished game with care put into it. Picking up hearts when your health is full turns them into coins so they're not a waste. Changing your costume changes the character portrait in cutscenes. Replaying a level with an unlocked character changes things if that character normally appears in the level. There's a level where you get picked up in a helicopter to escape and [spoiler]if you try to enter it from the top or rear, jumping through its blades, you get chopped to bits as Mark screams "Noooooo". It caught me totally off guard and I couldn't even be mad because it was hilarious.[/spoiler]

Cons:
-It's short. There are 27 levels total and if you just do a single playthrough and don't worry about collectibles/unlockables or the 7 optional levels then you'll only get a couple hours out of it.
-Too easy on any difficulty less than "Bro", probably due in part to its mobile origins. Your upgraded HP tops out at 16 hearts and enemies do 1 heart of damage on "Easy" and 2 hearts of damage on "Hard", but the checkpoints in the levels fully replenish you. "Bro" doubles the damage to 4 hearts and removes the checkpoints, providing a good challenge, though I feel there could be a happy medium between "Hard" and "Bro" for those looking for a slight challenge.
-When you replay a level the intro/outro cutscenes play again, forcing you to skip through dialogue. About half of the levels have some sort of intro/outro.
-Of all four YouTuber cameos in the game only one of them is really worked into the plot. The others are forced in and only relevant for a single level.

20452252.review:
Honestly, this is a very well put-together game.

There seem to be many people giving negative reviews of the game, and from what I can tell it seems to me that most people went into the game WANTING to hate it purely because it was "The PewDiePie Game" and PewDiePie is this person that half the internet hates for no good reason. Therefor, this review is going to be mainly focused on why the negative reviews are wrong in my eyes.

There's people saying that the music was bad, the graphics were bad, etc.... Those reasons all utterly ridiculous. There's nothing wrong with the graphics or soundtrack.

Really, there's only a few real reasons I could think of for hating the game:

1. It's style of humor; It contains various memes and humor that you would probably expect on PewDiePie's channel in the first place. As I said, many people hate PewDiePie's channel AND the style of humor on it, and those people probably wouldn't like the game's humor as they are very similar. Either way, that's a small part of the game and shouldn't detract from the enjoyment you can get out of it.

2. The story; It's extremely bland and boring. The evil barrels have captured all of PewDiePie's fans--yes, every single 40 million of them--and it's up to Pewds and his other YouTube friends to save them!!!!11!!1 Even though the YouTube friends are probably also technically 'fans' of Pewds and should also have been captured by the barrels but NEVER MIND THAT! While I think the story is bad, it's again, a small part of the game that can be easily overlooked.

3. The voice acting; While I have to admit that the voice acting done by the YouTubers isn't the most 'professional', you have to remember that these people are YouTubers, not professional voice actors. It might not be perfect, but it does the job well enough not to be distracting from the actual game or 'story'. A casual gamer isn't really going to care, but like I said, if you go in WANTING to hate it, then you'll probably end up hating it.

4. The length; For the type of game that it is, it is pretty short. You'll probably end up completing it in a couple hours at best.

All right, so my ending point is this:

I hate to say it but it's not really special, it's just a pixel graphics platformer game with PewDiePie's name on it, and a couple PewDiePie references here and there.

Also, considering how short it is, I don't think the $7.99 that they make you pay for this game is really fair. I agree with the $4.99 that the iOS version costed much more, and I still really can't understand why they upped the price.

That being said, it doesn't deserve all the criticism it's getting. It's not supposed to be a particularly special game. It's just simple, good for a couple hours of entertainment. The gameplay is good, with level ideas constantly changing and keeping the game fresh and interesting.

If you're a fan of PewDiePie, you'll very likely enjoy this game. If you hate PewDiePie, you'll probably end up hating this game. Really, it's just a simple game, nothing more, nothing less.

20434406.review:
Most negative reviews for this game can't even be described as reviews. It's just meaningless hate towards PewDiePie which I don't even understand. I personally wouldn't call myself a PewDiePie fan, but I do watch his stuff ocassionally (his non-gaming stuff mostly) and heard about this and since [b]I freaking love retro platformers[/b] I decided to get this. I'm gonna be honest and judge the actual game. Kinda funny though how many complain about PDP's fanbase for immaturity and then buy the game just to give a negative feedback and refund. Because that totally makes you even more immature.

First of all, if you think glorifies PDP's "overreacting" and screaming, you'll be disappointed because the game has none of that, in fact, it's far more tame than AVGN' Adventures which I loved but felt like it went over the top with swearing to the point of not being funny at all.

The game itself is a pretty standard NES-inspired new-retro platformer where you get to jump your way across levels, stomp on enemies, collect coins and use powerups. While it's nowhere near Shovel Knight's level, it's still really good, especially considering it was originally on mobile. Many levels have some twists to them instead of just being going from point A to point B. The graphics are a nice mix of 8 and 16-bit, look pretty nice and the levels are quite varied graphically. The music is amazing. It might be my favorite thing in this game. Kudos to the artist. The only real issue with the game is it's length. It's quite short, but at least it has some replay value and patches to collect for all your completionist needs. It's also pretty dang challenging on the highest and (especially) extra difficulty.

[b]Pros:[/b]
+ Nice presentation
+ Level Variety
+ Challenging
+ Other YouTubers are playable

[b]Cons:[/b]
- Short
- Some minor questionable level design bits

[b]Classic Score[/b]
Graphics: 8/10
Audio: 10/10
Gameplay: 7/10
Content: 6/10
Fun Factor: 8/10
[b]OVERALL SCORE:[/b] 7/10

20394600.review:
This game is absolutely nonsensical. I mean, maybe there's some lovely tapestry of narrative in it, but if I have to go watch a youtube dude to figure it out, you haven't told a good story. But you don't play this for the story (dear god I hope you don't, anyway). This game is a pretty open love letter to the 16-bit era slathered in a layer of surreality, and it actually plays damn well. Most levels basically spelled out their intent or were based on something I recalled from my younger days, and while I think one or two stages' gimmicks make their lack of checkpointing* irritating, only the rather-lengthy final boss really held me up for more than 15 minutes. It's also got a bunch of difficulty settings in case you find it too simple/challenging, and after you beat the endboss you can play anything you've beaten on Hard on a one-hit kill, no powerup mode, should you be masochistic enough.

I really wish cutscenes were skippable, but aside from that, this was actually real fun to fiddle with for a few nights.

* The game does feature checkpoints. Just not on some levels, which tend to be non-standard.

20362499.review:
I really wanted to enjoy this game and recommend it in the review. But I can't, I refunded the game and everything. I like Pewdiepie as a person (content is a different thing), so I wanted to give this game a good review, especially since a lot of people were just saying negative things on the forums because they just hate pewdiepie and because this game exists. Honestly, the toxic behavior wanted me to like the game more and hate pewdiepie less instead of hating the game and pewdiepie more. Although, I came into the game wanting it to be up to standards, it failed. The game is good if you're just a big pewdiepie fan, which is nothing wrong, people support their favorite content creator all the time. But if you're not a pewdiepie fan, or if you're a big 2D platformer fan, then the game will seem decent at best. The game felt boring as I played it, I felt if it had more "pewdiepie" humor, if the plot was mentioned more, or if the platformer game didn't seem so basic. If felt like a generic platformer with your favorite Youtubers in it for the most part. I can see that the Youtubers and the indie dev team actually tried their best, but I felt like it wasn't good enough to be a great plaformer game or even a pewdiegame. I mean it would've been slightly funny if he said something everytime he got hit by an enemy. Examples would've been "Damn Barells"  or "Damn no-scope". Something that would've shown signs of frustration on his journey to collect the legendary bro-fist. Which is only mentioned occasionally, the rest of the game is just bland level design for a platformer, with the exception of randomness on the screen. 

But yeah, I feel I've been rambling a lot for a while, so how about I just end with a conclusion. You'll might enjoy this game if you're a big pewdiepie fan if you get all the references and have been wanting to play this game for a while. You'll be disappointed if you're a big platformer fan because this game is not very innovative or creative from a level design standpoint. Especially for a $7.99 video game. If you just despise Pewdiepie, stay away from this game, you're not gonna enjoy nor will you be doing a greater good by pissing off a bunch of 12 year pewdiepie fans because you think his work is "poisioning the minds of the youth" or because they got butthurt over someone that hates pewdiepie. Let them have their fun, it's just a phase. This game was the first game I refunded. Honestly, I actually enjoyed watching someone else play the game, than playing the game myself, lol.

Ancak bazen ilginizi çeken birinin tepkilerini ve yorumlarını dinlemek de isteyebilirsiniz. Öyle ki yeterince uğraşır ve severek oyun oynayıp kayda alırsanız siz de izlenen biri olabilirsiniz. PewDiePie bunu başaran ilk oyunculardan biri.
 
Bir YouTube fenomeni haline gelen PewDiePie (Felix Kjellberg) için bir sürü hayran yapımı oyun çıkmış ve pek oyunda da kendisine yer verilmişti. Outerminds’ın yapımcılığını üstlendiği PewDiePie: Legend of the Brofist bu oyunlar içinde en iyisi diyebilirim. Geçen yıl Pewds sürpriz bir videoyla hayranlarının katkılarıyla bu oyunu geliştirmek istediğini söylemişti. Hayranlarından aldığı geri dönüşlerle Outerminds’ın geliştirdiği oyun tasarlandı ve Eylül ayında iOS ve Android'e, yaklaşık 4 hafta öncede Steam’a çıkışını yaptı.

Pewds son videosunun çekimini tamamlar. Yüklediği son videonun izlenme sayısına baktığında tek gördüğü koca bir 0’dır. Buna anlam veremezken evi varillerin istilasına uğrar ve hayranlarının kaçırıldığı anlar. Pewds esir alınmış hayranlarını en büyük düşmanları olan varillerin elinde kurtarmalıdır. Legend of the Brofist’in hikayesi böyle. Oyuna düşük not veren oyuncular hikayeden hiç memnun kalmamışlar. Ama ne bekliyorlardı anlamış değilim. Dalgacı, muzip bir üslupla oyun videoları çeken birinden bahsediyoruz. Pewds bu eğlenceli tarzıyla sevildi. Ciddi biri değil ki oyunu ciddi olsun.

Legend of the Brofist, oynanışıyla klasik platform oyunlarını andırıyor. Düşmanlarınızın üstüne atlayarak onları yok ediyor, sağdan soldan para topluyor, dikenlere düşünce ölüyorsunuz. Topladığınız paralarla canınızı yükseltebiliyor, yeni karakterler ve güçler açabiliyorsunuz. Canınız bitmeye doğru sevgili Pug’larınız Edgar ve Maya kendilerini feda ediyorlar. 3. darbede ise ölüyorsunuz.

Oyundan tam zevk alabilmek için Pewds lore’una hakim olup kendisinin sıkı bir takipçisi olmanız gerekiyor. Aksi takdirde karşınıza çıkan tiplere ve düşmanlara anlam veremezsiniz. Örneğin, Amnesia gibi pek çok oyunda yolunu kapatıp engel oldukları için varillerden nefret ediyor. Bu tür detaylar oyunu zenginleştirmekte. Gerçek YouTuber’ların seslendirmeleri, düzgün çalışan mekanikleri ve oyunun havasıyla uyumlu müzikleriyle Outerminds’ın gösterdiği özeni fark ediyorsunuz. Oyun kesinlikle baştan savma yapılmış değil.

Kıyaslama yapmam gerekirse, bir başka YouTuber olan Angry Video Game Nerd’in (Cinemassacre) oyunu bana fazla kaba ve zorlama gelmişti. Legend of the Brofist’i daha çok beğendim. PC portu sorunsuz olmuş ama özünde bir mobil oyun olduğu için oynanış süresi oldukça kısa. Aynı bölümleri tekrar oynamak ve daha çok para toplayıp, diğer karakterler oynama imkanınız olsa da ömrü kısa. Bunu eksi olarak saymış olabilirim ama çerez gibi bir oyun ve tadı hoşunuza gidecektir.

20265397.review:
Mit einem Wort: AWESOME! 
Ausführlich: Das einzige schlechte an dem Spiel ist die Story und natürlich ist es sehr kurz. Aber selbst wenn man kein großer Fan von Pewdiepie ist (so wie ich) ist es sehr empfehlenswert. 
Die Retro-grafik weckt in mir Nostalgie. Die Steuerung ist mit Tastatur vielleicht nicht die geilste, aber immer noch deutlich besser als auf dem Handy und mit dem Controller perfekt. Die Schwierigkeitsgrade sind steigend immer herausfordernder und verändern so viel an den einzelnen Leveln (Anzahl der Gegner, Stärke der Gegner, Anzahl von einzusammelden Gegenständen, verschwinden von Objekten,...). Die Level selbst sind vom Stil her auch sehr abwechslungsreich. Das Spiel steckt voller Eastereggs, also wird man vielleicht nicht alles erkennen, aber selbst ich hab einiges erkannt und musste in den meisten Momenten sehr stark lachen. Ich hatte es schon auf dem Handy und bereue nicht es nochmal gekauft und durchgespielt zu haben. Man kann es immer wieder spielen und es hat diesen typischen, endlosen "ein Versuch noch" Effekt. 
Ich gebe ja eigentlich keine Punktzahlen ab, aber würde ich hätte dieses Spiel in der Gesamtwertung 8/10. (Das einzige was noch fehlt wäre deutsches Voice acting von den im Spiel vorkommenden Youtubern selbst ;)

20247448.review:
Самый популярный автор на YouTube получил собственную игру PewDiePie: Legend of the Brofist. Сюжет до жути прост - злобная бочка захватила фанатов главного героя, и он будет спасать их.

Присоединяйтесь к эпическому 2D приключению вместе с "героями" YouTube: PewDiePie, Marzia, Markiplier, Jacksepticeye, Cinnamontoastken, Cryaotic. Если эти имена что-то для вас значат, то можете смело покупать игру. По ходу прохождения будут встречаться новые персонажи, за которых можно сыграть. Все они, разумеется, сами озвучивали свои роли. Главное не пропускать "БРО-монеты".

Игра выполнена в пиксельном стиле, где нужно сражаться с самым настоящим злом: единороги, тираннозавры, постоянно крутящийся жираф, стреляющий из снайперских винтовок. В общем, безумие кругом, как и в роликах автора. Кроме того, вы сможете обнаружить кучу пасхалок и отсылок. 

Пройти игру можно вместе со своим товарищем за одним компьютером. Есть и соревновательная арена на выживание.

PewDiePie: Legend of the Brofist изначально вышла на мобильных устройствах, но недавно она появилась и в Steam по достаточно демократичной цене.

虽然我当了几年别的实况主的搬运工，这款游戏要上steam我还是很激动的。不然我会考虑对这款游戏表示差评。
这款游戏本来是IOS手游，但是操作跟手感做得跟PC一样你们相信吗？
你用你的手指纹把你的Ipad屏幕蹭得发热也不容易打通简单模式！是时候上Steam了！
其他方面PC版只是原封不动将IOS版的内容搬上来而已，价格按天朝区说比PC版稍微便宜八九腿左右，这游戏折磨人的地方不少，你想轻松点我推荐你们买PC版。其次我稍微看得出开发商请诸位Youtuber配音的时候还是不敢配太多句子2333
本游戏出场的youtuber都是游戏博客（除了Mazia，她只是因为是Pewds的女朋友），类似于B站上你们熟悉，他们彼此也熟悉（这个更重要）的游戏区up一样。
友情出演：
Pewdiepie
CutiePieMarzia（Pewds的女朋友）
CinnimonToastKen（Pewds的好友）
Markiplier（好友）
Jacksepticeye（Mark的好友以及CP）
Cryaotic（Pewds的好友以及CP）
[strike]这说明了跟网红交朋友，自己离网红也不远了[/strike]
故事也是运用很多这些游戏博客的梗，比如说最明显的桶子敌人（Pewds最恨木桶），FalconLover（评论区中二小屁孩留言梗），小金人，滑溜溜的鲨鱼等等，太多了数不过来。当然还有同人区为之疯狂的PewdieCry（刚才提及的CP）
[u]总而言之，如果你很了解上述这些Youtuber，花原价买我相信你也不觉得心疼（毕竟31腿），不过还是保证自己是个Bros吧，其他博客出场次数除了Cryaotic也就一下子而已；如果你对他们一点也不了解，这只是个很普通的横版像素还带着点街机一样死板的操作的动作游戏。[/u]
+人物动作很细致
+很会用梗
+完全是给粉丝做的游戏
+收集系统
-PC版几乎没有改动
-热衷于接地气和加入非主流，基本的翻译做得不是很好
-有一关专门打飞机的，都什么年代了方向键只能同时按一个方向？
-配音平平淡淡，倒是怪物的配音挺喜欢
[spoiler]好吧这游戏其实我买来只是为了想写个评测[/spoiler]

19890518.review:
For the second time (the first, being Minecraft: Story Mode), I find myself shaking my head at my fellow gamers. Full disclosure; I'm not a pewdiepie fan. His voice just annoys me. Thing is, I'm sure he's an okay guy, and I don't think less of him for his success or anything. As such, when I saw this game's trailer and saw it was a fun-looking platformer, I thought I'd give it a try. I like platformers, and I have to say, despite all the negative reviews, this is a pretty good little platformer game. I'm sure there are dozens of references I'm just not getting, but there are plenty of jokes that any gamer will get. The controls are tight, the levels are varied ... so far, it's been a fun ride.  I'm still working my way through it, but so far, I can't really complain.  

I guess what I'm saying is that if you're not really on either side like me, this is still a pretty fun game ... no matter how many downvotes I get for being even vaguely positive about this game.

19843683.review:
«Hey, how’s it going bros? My name is PewDiePie».

PewDiePie: Legend of the Brofist – это 2D платформер, разработанный в честь самого известного в мире ютубера Феликса «PewDiePie» Чельберга. Игровой процесс типичен для платформера, но имеет некоторые особенности, к тому же наполнен множеством отсылок и фирменным юмором в стиле Pewd. 

Все фанаты похищены злобным королём бочек! Кто же их спасёт? Конечно же, наши герои, могучий и непобедимый Пьюди и его любимые мопсы, а так же другие известные ютуберы, такие как Markiplier, Jacksepticeye, Marzia, Cinnamontoastken и Cryaotic. Следует отметить, что диалоги персонажей озвучены непосредственно самими звёздами ютуба, это добавляет игре шарма. Где вы ещё встретите такое большое количество видеоблогеров и летсплейщиков? Чтобы освободить всех преданных фанатов, нашим героям придётся преодолеть десятки различных уровней, каждый из них обладает уникальным дизайном, противниками и иногда даже механикой. На каждом уровне спрятано множество секретов, за всё прохождение я нашёл только один, а всего их около сорока. Каждый босс является в своём роде уникальным противником, к которому придётся подбирать особую тактику и снаряжение, об этом чуть позже. Всего около четырёх-пяти боссов. В игре представлено три вида сложности, причём на самом последнем, который называется очень символично «Бро», пройти игру становится проблематично, это займёт определённое время. Бро – это все фанаты и подписчики блоггера, а кулак, который изображен на иконке сложности и на некоторых других элементах интерфейса, является фирменным жестом Пьюди, которым он всегда заканчивает свои ролики.

PewDiePie: Legend of the Brofist наполнена множеством различных отсылок, которые гарантированно обрадуют фанатов. Рассказывать про них я не буду, пусть это лучше останется сюрпризом, я не хочу испортить вам впечатление. Дизайн каждого уровня выполнен изумительно красиво, каждый элемент игры выглядит очень сочно и красочно, порой начинаешь забывать, что играешь в пиксель-стайл платформер.  Музыка под стать дизайну имеет некий олдскульный стиль под названием чиптюн — электронная музыка, синтезируемая в реальном времени аудиочипом компьютера или игровой приставки, автором является RUSHJET1!.

В игре есть интересная система кастомизации и прокачки. На каждом уровне мы собираем «Бро-монеты», которые мы можем потратить на открытие дополнительных персонажей, оружия, предметов, а так же на их улучшение. Каждый предмет или способность является как таковой отсылкой к творчеству Pewd, вы будете приятно удивлены. В игре так же есть локальный кооператив на двух игроков, оценить который я смогу в ближайшее время. В наличии есть карточки и достижения Steam, игра полностью поддерживает контроллер. Игра так же переведена на Русский язык, прошу заметить, качественно. 

В итоге, мы имеем неплохой платформер, который обязателен к приобретению всем «Бро». Если же вы не являетесь таковым, то вы получите неплохой платформер, который с удовольствием пройдёте за два-три часа на лёгкой сложности. Хардкорным же геймерам не хватит и дня на то, чтобы пройти игру на сложности «Бро», тем самым показав свой статус фаната известнейшего в мире деятеля ютуба. Я хоть и не являюсь таковым, но с огромным удовольствием провёл в игре порядка шести часов (в Steam показывает меньше, так как я играл, пока у меня не было интернета). Если сомневаетесь, берите по скидке 50%, полтора доллара она точно уж стоит, а половину стоимости окупит карточками.

19813148.review:
A simple fun platformer with a charming pixel art style. 
While I would say this game may be lost to those who aren't familiar with Pewdiepie (and Lore), but definitely a fun experience for those whom are.

Feels a little short for the casual player, but has some replayable value for completionists (added characters/costumes, patches, achievements, ect) However the added Halloween and Christmas levels are a nice added touch.

What really makes this game special is the humourous writing,voice acting and the inclusion of other 'Youtubers' such as Markiplier, CinnamonToastKen, JackSepticEye and Cryaotic.
What's also nice is pacing of the game and the subtle nods to other 'pixel' games such as Megaman and Zelda.

All in all, it's very much at heart, a game for the fans of Pewdiepie.

19811414.review:
Ich habe dieses Spiel von einem Freund geschenkt bekommen, weil ich dieses Spiel unbedingt spielen wollte. Nach denn ersten Levels hatte ich Spaß und fand es sogar gut. Pewdiepie hat in einigen seiner Videos ja auch etwas von dem Spiel gezeigt. Ich dachte mir, dass die erste Schwierigkeitsstufe doch recht einfach ist und ich deswegen mal Medium austeste in bereits gespielten Leveln und muss sagen, dass ist echt krass schwer, wenn nicht sogar schon zu schwer. Es kommen so viele Barrels, dass du nicht mal mehr vernüftig gehen oder springen kannst bzw. wenn du eine töten willst, Schaden von anderen kriegst. Ebenfalls bist du nach dem Sammel (Kleidungshaufen) nicht mal 1-2 Sekunden immun, was ziemlich nervig sein kann, wenn dich in dem Moment der Cutscene eine Barrel angreift. Der Spawn selbst ist manchmal echt perfekt von deinen Gegner, wenn du ihnen auf den Kopf springst kriegst du sogar Schaden, weil du ihnen anscheinend doch nicht auf den Kopf gesprungen bist. Das Subway-Level hat mir letztsendlich den kompletten Nerv geraubt. Ich dachte mir, wie soll man sowas schaffen, wenn soviele Gegner auf einmal auf dich zu kommen. Das ist für Jump' Run Anfänger einfach nur recht erschwerlich zu schaffen. Nach mehrmaligen probieren dieses Level habe ich den tiefsten Wunsch gehegt meinen Kontroller gegen die Wand zu schmeißen und rumzuschreinen, konnte dies aber innehalten da es lediglich nur ein Spiel ist. Ebenso mussten mein Freund & ich feststellen dass es kein Online-Koop gibt. Das finde ich, fehlt. Lokal-Koop ist möglich, fein und gut, aber was ist mit Online? Ich bin ein großer Fan von Pewdiepie und bereue es nicht, dass Spiel gekauft zu haben, jedoch gibt es einige Dinge die verbesserungswürdig sind.

Im groben und Ganzen ist ansich das Spiel zu empfehlen und leicht auf der ersten Schwiergkeitsstufe. Jedoch regt es Leute, die in Jump' Runs nicht geübt sind (oder generell Menschen, die sich leicht aufregen) auf und dann spielt man es erstmal eine Zeit lang nicht. Ich vermisse außerdem einen Online-Multiplayer. Ebenso ist noch zu sagen, dass Menschen, die Pewdiepie nicht intensiv gucken bzw. nicht kennen einige dieser Witze nicht verstehen werden und es somit für einige "unlustig" sein kann. Sonst ist das Spiel gut gestaltet, das Voiceacting ist ebenfalls gut und es ist ein gutes kleines Spiel für zwischendurch.

19780296.review:
Bei "PewDiePie: Legend of the Brofist" handelt es sich um ein Jump'n'run das sich selbst nicht gerne ernst nimmt. Die Aufgabe ist es sich durch viele verschiedene Level zu spielen indem man wie bei alten klassikern ("Super Mario", Donkey Kong" ... durch level springt, kleine Aufgaben erledigt und Gegner sowie Bosse besiegt.

Das Spiel bietet dabei nicht nur das kleine 1 x 1 der Jump'n'run sondern auch ein paar Schwierigkeitsgrade, viele Freischaltbare CHaraktere, Angriffe, Verteidigungsfähigkeiten,Sammelobjekte und verschiedene Art wie ein level zu gespielt werden muss.
So läuft man in einem Level nur zu Fuß von einer Seite zur anderen und besiegt ein paar gegner und im nächsten fliegt man mit einem kleinen Propellerflugzeug durch den Himmel und spielt Kampfpilot. Viele weitere kleine Dinge wie Gegenwind, Rückenwind, Autobahnspringeinlagen, Survival und ähnliches erwartn einen.

Pros: 
- Sehr gute Steuerung
- Viel Abwechslung
- viele verschiedene Gegner
- teilweise sehr Lustige Anspielungen auf ander Spiele oder das genre selbst
- Süße und gute Pixelgrafik
- Steam Achievements
- Cloud Speicherung
- Ein Wiederspielwert ist zum teil gegeben da in höheren Schwierigkeitsgraden bei einigen Leveln nicht nur mehr Gegner sondern teils auch längere Aufgaben auf einen zukommen.
-....

Con:
- Leider nach ca 2h auf leicht bereits Durchgespielt
- Videos liesen sich beim  2. spielen eines Levels nicht überspringen und mussten immer wieder angeschaut werden.
- Die Achievementsynchronisierung ist teils sehr verzögert, so bekam ich manche erst nach 5 Minuten, andere erst nach beenden des SPieles und wieder andere sofort


Fazit:
Ein finde ich sehr guter Jump'n'Run Titel bei dem man sich aber vorher im klaren sein soll das er sich selbst, wie man beim Titel schon merken sollte, nicht direkt ernst nimmt. Voll gespickt mit witzen oder auch manchmal einfach doofen Aussagen und Texten . Der Preis von 7,99 ist recht hoch gestochen aber im Sale kann man als Fan dieses gnres gerne zugreifen und ein paar Stunden Spaß haben.

19733953.review:
[h1]Gameplay[/h1]
The gameplay is fun for only a short while, and gets boring quite quickly. Fortunately, as you progress through the levels, you unlock new abilities which add some variety. The characters usually only have 1 difference, (gameplay wise) and that's their abilities. Collecting all of the patches was an easy challenge except for a few, so the game is quite easy. (except on pug mode)

[h1]Graphics[/h1]
The game's graphics are quite appealing and use pixel graphics, simple enough for the game to run well, and the art's good enough for you to distinguish between the characters. It's very colourful and only a few levels had boring designs. (such as the caves) 

[h1]Final Thoughts[/h1]
The game is quite enjoyable and runs well, with appealing graphics as well. However, the game is quite short with repetitive levels and only harder difficulty modes and co-op options for thosewho want to continue playing the game. Most of the humour is quite childish and will only be enjoyed or understood by pewdiepie fans. The voice acting is quite bad, despite that most of the people in the game have done skits or similar things before.
The game gets a [b]7/10[/b] but with price tag of £5.60 and the story being as short as it is it is hard to recommend.

Buy it when it's on a sale for about 50% less or more, and it's worth getting, just don't buy it if you don't like the guy because then it'll be the biggest cringe-fest on the internet.

19713329.review:
Pour commencer : n'acheter pas ce jeu si vous n'êtes pas fan / ne connaissez pas pewdiepie, vous n'y verrez sinon qu'un jeu de plateforme classique et absolument loufoque.
Par contre, si vous appreciez le personnage, faites vous plaisir. Le jeu est très maniable à la manette et bourré de réferences aux vidéos du plus grand youtuber : de Stephano à Shannon le requin (WHY ARE YOU SO SLIPPERY) en passant par Jennifer, la trop grosse pierre. 
On note aussi la présence d'autre de ses amis youtubers, tels que Ken, Cry et la délicieuse Marzia. Qui sont tous jouable ! et avec des skins differents ! (qui plus est, les personnages porteront le skin choisit lors des passages de dialogues. 
En parlant des dialogues, ces derniers sont doublés par les vrais youtuber, eeeeeeeet... bon d'accord, c'est un désastre. Mais Pewdipie avait dit dans sa vidéo sur son jeu qu'il avait eu beaucoup de mal à lire ses textes en mettant les bonnes émotions. Mais bon cela ne gâche pas l'experience.
Le jeu en lui même est plutôt court, comptez 3-4 heures pour le finir, mais chaque niveau est rejouable avec des difficultés differentes, et d'ailleurs très difficiles pour le mode de difficulté "bro". En plus de cela, chaque niveau est bourré de petits "patchs", des sortes de tableaux, à trouver et qu'on pourra par la suite admirer dans la collection. 
Chaque personnage possède une aptitude propre a lui même, comme Ken qui peu se transformer en ours ou Pewdiepie avoir un brofist surpuissant. tout ces aptitudes sont achetables a l'aides des pièces récoltées dans le jeu, et on peu améliorer la vie des differents youtubers. 
La présence du multijoueur (seulement en local) est aussi très amusante, surtout une fois le "pug mode" débloqué, où on ne possède plus qu'un coeur de vie.

En bref, un bon jeu de plateforme, très fun, à la durée de vie rentabilisée si vous y jouez avec un ami ou si vous tentez de finir les niveaux dans des difficultés supérieures.

19692886.review:
[h1]Не смотря на то, что я не очень люблю PewDiePie. Игра мне понравилась.[/h1]

Первое, на что я псмотрел перейдя на страницу в магазине - это скриншоты.
Мне уже началась нравиться это игра и оказалось там добавили еще много всего разнообразного.

Об озвучке. Читая описание я думал, что они наврали с оригинальной озвучкой. Оказалось нет.

Руссификация. Мы покупаем игры не просто для того что-бы посмотреть картинку, но и влиться в сюжет. Нет ничего странного, что нет русской озвучки. Но хороший перевод через субтитры сделали.

На счет совместной локальной игры наврали. Её тут нет. Оказывается нужно просто 1 джойстик (Да! Не геймпад. Я вырос на денди) и 1 клавиатуру. Или по крайней мере 2 клавиатуры для совместого прохождения.

Маленький, но приятный плюс - это поддержка Steam Cloud. теперь можно не беспокоиться, что все данные игры стерутся и просто сохранить в облаке.

Не знаю я насчет режима "Бро". Лично даже 1 уровень не мог пройти с ним. Оставалось несколько шагов до машины. Надеюсь понизят некоторые значения.

Минус этой игры в том, что она очень быстро проходиться. Достаточно 3 часа. Остальная половина - это дополнительные уровни.

I actually like it, and I don't fall into the category "12 year old who likes to yell and buy irrelevant things with their parent's credit card."

The game itself is actually good for a few hours, and I love the collectability. The whole patches idea is like a wall of fame, commemorating all the jokes and refrencing old pewdiepie material from the past 5 years. Being able to collect, upgrade, and enhance characters that people know is good fun, but unfortunately they are similar in every way, unless you have purchased that character's specific defense / attack move.

All in all while the game is repeatitive, that is the nature of 2D platformers.

If you like PewDiePie, its worth your seven bucks.
If you don't, this game isn't going to change your mind.

I would reccomend this game to fans of PewDiePie, or casual gamers looking to get a kick out of a solid 2D platformer.

This is, surprisingly enough from all the negative reviews, a fun platformer. Now, first thing, if you don't like PewDiePie, why are you even here? A lot of the dislike for the game seems to come from one of 3 things, 2 of which are reasonable. 

1. Bad experience with bugs and glitches. I have yet to encounter any myself, but a player should always be wary of such. 

2. Dislike of the quality. Completely understandable. The voice acting is not that great, and the platforming is rather simple. Don't expect Super Mario or Shovel Knight from this gam (not that the others were, or anything). This seems to be a rather simple game specially crafted for fans of Felix and his friends. 

3. This is the unreasonable one. Some people seem to have purchased this game with the intention of giving it a negative review because they don't like the man whose name is plastered on the title screen. They feel the need to insult their peers for enjoying PewDIePie's content, as it's not suited to them. If you're one of those people, there is NO NEED to temporarily spend your money, but instead just do it in a comment section or something for virtually free.

Through my small amount of gameplay so far, I'd say that only if you're a fan of Felix and co. then go right on ahead and buy. If not, maybe take a small dip and see if you'll enjoy it for the simple game that it is. Hey, maybe you'll find a new source of entertainment from the content creators included. Or the duck. You can always like ducks.  And if you hate him for whatever reason, I beg that you spend your time and money doing something more worthwhile, like charity or children. Please?

Personally, as an on and off fan, I'd recommend buying this during a sale. Thanks for taking the time to read this! Bye!

I don't personally understand all the negative reviews I've read before deciding to purchase this game myself. Being a pewdiepie fan myself since the beginning I understood a lot of the references, and I chuckled. I do agree that the voice acting isn't that great, and it is dissapointing. But, regardless, the gameplay is fun and reminds me of the old school SNES gameplay mixed with the new school. In terms of difficulty, it takes a bit to master the timing, but anyone who's played in my time of NES/SNES will remember the frustration of timed jumps, and being unable to get to the correct platform with stairs. TO be honest, it takes me back, and gives me a sense of nostalgia. I'd recommend picking it up and trying it for yourself. If you don't enjoy it, simply refund it back. I know I have only a few minutes of gameplay so far, but this is just my first impression.

My personal opinion:

Voice Acting 2/10 - Not great, could use a lot of improvement
Gameplay 8/10 - Nostalgia factor for the 90's kids
Customization 5/10 - Pretty cool unlocks for picking up "bro" coins
Control 5/10 - At times feels slippery, but again, reminds me of the NES/SNES era

A worthy buy, try it out yourself :)

19649489.review:
PewDiePie, la légende du Brofist arrive sur PC après son passage sur plateforme mobile.
L'ayant terminé sur Android je me permets donc d'écrire cette petite review.

PewDiePie Legend Of The Brofist est un jeu plateformer style retro pixélisé comme beaucoup de développer aime l'utiliser.

L'histoire : 
Ici il s'agira de suivre PewDiePie, dont les abonnés ont été enlevés par ses pires ennemis, les barrils.
Son aventure lui permettra de rencontrer plusieurs de ses amis Youtubers qui l'aideront dans son aventure pour récupérer ses abonnés kidnappés. Que ce soit au pole nord ou dans l'espace, tout est lié a l'univers qu'a crée Pewds tout au long de son aventure sur Youtube.

Le Gameplay : 
Putain que ca fait du bien d'avoir un pad / clavier en main contrairement au maniement sur Mobile que je trouvais juste catastrophique. Le personnage de pewds répond bien, peut-être même trop bien ce qui retire la difficulté que j'ai pu ressentir dans le maniement sur mobile. Il vous faudra récupérer un maximum de pièces tout au long de l'aventure pour "upgrader" PewDiePie et ses amis que vous pourrez débloquer et jouer tout au long du jeu tout en débloquant de super pouvoir toujours lié au célèbre Youtuber moyennant des petites pièces. Les décors se renouvellent bien, certains niveaux change le gameplay comme par exemple un magnifique passage en avion. Quand aux ennemis, cela se corse au fils de niveaux pour ne pas laisser le joueur dans trop de simpliciter. 

Durée de vie : 
Au tarif proposé ne vous attendez pas a une longue durée de vie (entre 2h et 3h grand maximum). Ce qui est toujours plus long que les DLC de Batman Arkham Knight !

Bande son : 
Très retro, on ressent le coté nostalgique d'une époque révolue depuis des années et qui a bercé l'enfance de nombreux d'entre nous. Elle colle bien au style du jeu. 

Conclusion : 
Assez simple dans les faits, PewDiePie Legend Of The Brofist est un jeu qui fera surtout et avant tout plaisir aux fans du numéro 1 de Youtube. Que se soit l'humour, les personnages, l'univers haut en couleur ou le scénario, tout lui est lié. Est-ce un mauvais jeu? Non clairement non. Il fait passé un bon moment et c'est tout ce que je lui demandai. De plus l'intégration d'un mode Coop locale sur la version PC est une très bonne idée. Mais ce jeu n'interessera peut-être pas autant le joueur qui ignore qui est PewDiePie ou encore les gens qui vouent une haine/jalousie stupide envers Pewds.

A réserver aux fans qui connaissent bien et suivent les aventures de PewDiePie sur Youtube.
PS : Bien que le jeu soit un jeu mobile, il n'utilise aucun système Pay 2 Win !

19627400.review:
PewDiePie: The legend of the Brofist is pretty co- No I'm lying, it's not cool at all.

Remember back in the day when controllers had like, three buttons and roughly the same amount of pixels? Remember those really weird marketing games that came out like McKids and CoolSpot and that one game about the noid? This is essentially the modern day version of that. 

You play as Felix Arvid Ulf Kjellberg, a Swedish man who, like me, enjoys yelling at children. But unlike me, Felix gets paid to do so. Suddenly, Felix's home is attacked by...Barrels for some reason and apparently all those kids he likes to yell at were kidnapped. Now, Felix is forced to go on an adventure where he meets people I don't know while making jokes I don't understand so he can save kids I don't like while fighting an enemy I don't care about. Also, he has two dogs that I sacrifice for my own gain on a regular basis. 

PewDiePie: The legend of the kidney stones is a 2d side scrolling adventure that will take you around 3 hours to finish. The gameplay is as simple as moving forwards and then jumping with two buttons for powerups that aren't very good. At first, I thought the game was kind of fun, but the longer the game went on and the further I got, Felix's slidey and floaty jumping really got on my nerves. It feels unresponsive and clunky once there are more than three things to dodge on screen. 

Now, I will admit, I enjoyed myself [spoiler]for a total of twenty minutes.[/spoiler] before all of it got on my bad side. This game made me itchy if that made any sense. 

I did not finish PewDiePie: The legend of the wasted lunch money, and I have no intention of ever finishing it. I got to the last boss and that was it for me, I had no intention of finding out what happens at the end. I'd ask who this game is for but there are roughly 40 million people subscribed to the Youtube account so I guess that question is already answered for me. 

Should you play: PewDiepIe: The legend of the fuckthisgame? 

I honestly don't even know how to make this review entertaining, I'm pretty much just rambling and hoping all of this makes sense, I don't know it could be the huffed paint talking. 

Don't play this game unless Felix is your surrogate best friend, I got it as a gift from a friend and he is currently clawing at the inside of a coffin desperately gasping for air at the bottom of a lake. 

Pewdiepie doesn't get a score, no, I'm not doing it, you can't make me. I'm sure this scathing review will hurt Felix plenty, he can cry himself to sleep on his bed made of money. 

You get nothing out of nothing. 

I'm going to go stare at a wall and think about Robocop for a few hours. 

The place where I talk about games I actually like: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/Dickbuttexperience#curation

19623994.review:
[h1]Très bon jeu de plateforme ![/h1]

Lorsque j'ai vu ce jeu débarquer sur Steam j'ai étais un peu sceptique, un jeu avec Pewdiepie et ses amis de Youtube ? On va une fois de plus se taper un jeu très moyen voir mauvais qui exploite l'image de célébrités pour vendre un produit de mauvaise qualité ? 


Et bien si vous aussi vous pensiez la même chose sachez qu'en réalité ce n'est absolument pas le cas, [u]Pewidiepie : Legend of the Brofist[/u] est un jeu de plateforme faussement rétro tout simplement excellent. Que ce soit les graphismes, les musiques, le gameplay ou même les nombreuses références à l'univers du youtuber suédois tout est très travaillé et soigné dans les moindres détails.


Comme pour le jeu AVGN il est préférable d'être avant tout un fan ne serait-ce que pour comprendre certaines blagues ou les nombreuses références mais au final qu'on soit fan ou non de Pewds le jeu est juste génial, tout est bon, le fun est immédiat et la diversité présente dans les différents niveaux mais aussi dans le bestiaire offre une aventure très plaisante à suivre mais également très plaisante à recommencer. D'ailleurs si on souhaite débloquer tout ce que le jeu a à offrir ( personnages / pouvoirs / améliorations ) il faudra de toute façon recommencer plus d'une fois le jeu et se lancer le défi de pourquoi pas finir l'histoire dans une difficulté supérieure. 


A l'heure actuelle la seule chose qu'il manque à ce jeu c'est du multijoueurs en ligne, autrement c'est un pure bonheur que d'y jouer et alors que je ne m'attendais à rien de spécial je suis le premier surpris par la très grande qualité de ce titre surtout compte tenu de son prix relativement faible en comparaison de tout ce qu'il offre et de l'effort qu'il à dû demander à ses créateurs. Bref vraiment un très bon jeu.

Edit: PTDR les cons qui se dépêche de dislike mon évaluation juste parce qu'il aime pas Pewdiepie, mon évaluation est totalement objective. Faut grandir un peu...

19623185.review:
This is a real and serious review from a causual platformer gamer who admits that he actually is a follower of pewdiepie but is old enough to differentiate between stupid fanboiism and objective critic.

I played through the game on easy and a couple of levels on hard, I tryed a few levels on "bro" difficulty but couldn't beat a single one yet (I didn't try too hard yet tho)

The Port: This is something a lot of hater are talking about. Yes the game was first released for mobile devices but did it really hurt the desktop version? After a playthrough I can hinestly say: Not at all. This doesn't feel like a port at all.

Graphics: Just look at the pictures. Either u like 8 Bit graphics or u don't. 

story: makes barely any sense but nobody who every watched anything of pewdiepie would ever expect anything else. gladly the dialoge is very short and doesnt matter at all to enjoy the game. If you dont like pewds just mute the game.

Gameplay: The probably biggest point of platformers. This game plays out perfectly. The controls are on spot and could hardly be any better. If you fail it for sure ain't the games fault.

Difficulty: No, this is not an easier AVGN clone, this game itself is tough as nails. While easy is actually really easy, later levels are already quite difficult on "hard" difficulty. And beyond hard are still 2 difficultys of whom 1 needs to be unlocked first. "bro" difficulty really aint easy and might prove a challenge even to die hard platformer players. "pug" difficulty is supposed to be insane of what I heard yet.

Replay value: multiple difficultys, lots of unlockables, multiple chars. nothing more to say.

critic: there are actually only 2 things I didnt like about the game. First is that you actually have to play markiplyer in almost every level at least once because some of the patches are ronly reachable by his double jump. 
second: the game could have more useful unlockables. While the patches are certainly better than nothing they dont add too much to the game while the abilitys lack variety and get old quite fast. They work technically but I wish there were more of them to unlock. I wish the game had more skins as well.

Overall: If you like pewdiepie or not is totally up to you but this game is a very good platformer despite its origins. 9/10

meh. I liked the graphics but I played it once and won't go back. It's odd because it has a few things going for it but ultimately it's average and forgetable.
I'm not too well versed in the Pewdiepie world and it's heavily referenced, so all that is lost on me. In fact I would say a lot of it is lost to anyone who's not pewdiepie or one of the other youtubers featured in the game.
It's trying too hard with the "bro" stuff and just doesn't really get to be fun at all, funny or remotely compeling.  

Poor level designs, very week jumping mechanics and that sliding when you stop wolking make it awkward and sluggish. 
The voice acting is probably the worse part, I would have left it to text only as it just takes away any legitimacy it would have had as a game. 
It's probably best suited for mobile phone gaming: simple, not challenging and quite forgetable. Ideal for extended bathroom visits. 
Probably for fans only really, and even then for those who like bland instantly forgetable stuff.

Thankfully I got a refund.

19598245.review:
PewDiePie: Legend of the Brofist is actually a very well-made and fun game.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o9o12p2blPQ
I personally don't enjoy PewDiePie's content. He seems like a nice guy, but his videos simply don't entertain me, so I'll be reviewing this strictly on how good it is as a game.

The game obviously has a lot of inside jokes that fans of PewDiePie will get more out of than I did. The weakest part of the game was the dialogue. Not to say that it's awful or anything, but it was nothing special, and not too funny.
However, the animations, sprites and gameplay were funny, so it was fine. 

The game is more fun with a friend in co-op, although doesn't make much of a difference. Most of the levels comprise of the basic platformer rules. Jump onto enemies to kill them, although there are some levels that shake things up a bit like a side scrolling plane shooter.

The gameplay stays fresh by allowing you to purchase new characters and powerups with the money you've earned throughout levels.

Overall, the gameplay doesn't feel incredibly unique or anything. It's simple and mostly sticks to what has worked in most platformers, but it does it all well! It's a pretty fun game.

(Review copy was provided by the devs, but it does not affect my opinion on the game)
